tool.name: tool_22
tool.displayname: Grids from classified grid and table

param.name: TABLE
param.dialogReference:
Table

Table (input)

The table with the (numeric) data values for each class. The module creates a grid for each table column (besides the ID).

param.name: ID_FIELD
param.dialogReference:
Attribute

Table field

The attribute with the class IDs, used to link the table and the grid.

param.name: CLASSES
param.dialogReference:
Classes

Grid (input)

The grid coded with the class IDs.

param.name: GRIDS
param.dialogReference:
Grids

Grid list (optional output)

optional

The output grids, one grid for each table column.

idCitation.resTitle: Grids from classified grid and table
